name: contingency_insurance_days
title: Within how may days after Acceptance will you remove the Insurance contingency?
label: Insurance Days
description: This applies because you chose not to waive this contingency.
tips: Most sellers prefer shorter contingency periods. Consider your lender's requirements when setting this timeline.
small_print: Discuss the insurability of the property with your insurance agent. You will want to contact them immediately and confirm whether you can get what you need as far as insurance policies. Failure to obtain insurance may impede your ability to purchase the property.

suggested.hint: A timeline greater than 21 days may be less attractive to the seller.
